StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_mg_InsertGeoLoca.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @tCityText as varchar(50), @tCountyCode as char(3), @tStateCode as char(2)) as declare @user_login varchar(15), @update_date date.me, @tMaxCityCode char(4), @tCityCode char(4)
if not exists (select 1 from geo_loca.on where city_text = @tCityText and county_code = @tCountyCode and state_code = @tStateCode) begin
set @user_login = 'o_migra.on' set @update_date = getdate()
Set @tMaxCityCode = (Select top 1 city_code from geo_loca.on where county_code = @tCountyCode and state_code = @tStateCode order by city_code desc)
if @tMaxCityCode is null begin Set @tCityCode = '0001'
insert into geo_loca.on (city_code, county_code, state_code, city_text, user_login, update_date) values (@tCityCode, @tCountyCode, @tStateCode, @tCityText, @user_login, @update_date)
end else begin Set @tCityCode = right(('0000' + cast((cast(@tMaxCityCode as int) + 1) as varchar)), 4)
insert into geo_loca.on (city_code, county_code, state_code, city_text, county_text, state_text, user_login, update_date) select top 1 @tCityCode, @tCountyCode, @tStateCode, @tCityText, county_text, state_text, @user_login, @update_date from geo_loca.on where county_code = @tCountyCode and state_code = @tStateCode
end end
